title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 – Jul 15 2021
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 – Jul 15 2021
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3: Clay and Buck welcome thirteen-time New York Times bestselling author Ann Coulter to the show to discuss critical race theory. “To the left, everything is racist.” The government has partnered with social media to censor whatever it deems misinformation. Big donor Republicans are wrecking the party. How can we push back from Big Tech’s censorship? Rush’s Timeless Wisdom: Wokeness is ruining sports. Socialist Bernie Sanders has thoughts on the $4.1 trillion “infrastructure”: Tax the rich to keep inflation in check. The poor and middle class will feel the brunt of the oncoming inflation.  

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
